amendment.description: An amendment to authorize the President to use all necessary means, consistent with the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide,to stop genocide in Darfur, Sudan.

action.text: Mr. Kolbe raised a point of order against the Capuano amendment (A017). Mr. Kolbe raised a point of order against the amendment stating that it proposed to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill in violation of clause 2 of rule 21. The Chair sustained the point of order.
